committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Mining and Natural Resources

official_title: To amend the Mineral Leasing Act to provide for the continuation of certain leases on mineral estates upon the vesting of a present interest of the United States to such mineral estates.

summary.text: Amends the Mineral Leasing Act to permit, upon the leaseholder's election, noncompetitive continuation of certain oil or gas leases on lands in which the United States held a vested future interest in the mineral estate which has become a vested present interest in it. Requires that: (1) oil or gas was being produced before the present mineral interest vested in the United States; and (2) such lease issued without competitive bidding.

titles.title: To amend the Mineral Leasing Act to provide for the continuation of certain leases on mineral estates upon the vesting of a present interest of the United States to such mineral estates.
